mapper.select: SELECT a.stifSeq ,a.stifName ,a.stifDesc ,b.stlcSeq ,b.stlcName ,b.stlcLat ,b.stlcLng ,b.stlcDelNy ,b.StoreInfo_stifSeq ,c.year ,c.month ,c.day ,c.uuidName ,c.type ,c.sort FROM StoreInfo a left join eatja.StoreLocation as b on b.StoreInfo_stifSeq = a.stifSeq and b.stlcDelNy = 0 left join eatja.infrMemberUploaded as c on c.pseq = a.stifSeq and c.delNy = 0 and c.sort = 0 and c.type = 0 WHERE 1=1 AND stlcDelNy = 0

SELECT a.stifSeq ,a.stifDesc ,b.seq ,b.type ,b.originalName ,b.uuidName ,b.pseq ,b.year ,b.month ,b.day FROM StoreInfo a left join eatja.infrMemberUploaded as b on b.pseq = a.stifSeq and b.delNy = 0 WHERE 1=1 AND delNy = 0
SELECT stifSeq ,stifDesc FROM StoreInfo WHERE 1=1 AND stifDelNy = 0
